item.title: 🟠 06:49 Attack Dronov-Kamikadzerukh in the direction
item.description: 🟠 06:49 Attack Dronov-Kamikadzerukh in the direction This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
